item.description:
The South Windsor Newly Single or Just Single Meetup Group has invited us to Happy Hour on Friday Night!

When:
Friday, September 28, 2007, 5:30 PM 20070928T213000Z
Where:
Adams Mill
165 Adams Street Manchester
Manchester , CT 06042
860-524-9136
Info/Map
Description:
Adams Mill Happy Hour (Adult)

Free appetizers, free music, lets have our first Adult night out. We as a group could always make plans to do something later that evening.

We will meet up stairs in the lounge, I will let the group know how to find us closer to the event.

RSVP at http://newlysingle.me...

Click To RSVP
